page.title: 10Hellesdon's Local Residents
page.content: The Joby family of Hellesdon have been bitten by the Quiz bug.Dr.Richard Joby was a BBC "Mastermind" finalist and his son Christopher is junior Mastermind. They have appeared in shows such as "Brain of Britain",Hughie Green's quiz programmes,Radio Norfolk shows and a quiz game called "Gambit". Dr.Joby is the son of an engine driver and this has led to a deep and abiding interest in Railways.He has become one of the county's experts on the subject. He has written many books on the subject.He recently gave up teaching at North Walsham Girl's High School to devote more time to his writing, lecturing for UEA. and holding tutorials for the Open University. His appearance on "Mastermind" as a finalist caused the family a year of upheaval, with a great deal of travel and fat files of correspondance.
